import './style.scss'; import React, { Component } from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser'; import Prices from 'components/Prices/index.js' import { ProdImage } from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Image' import TrustabilityBadges from "components/TrustabilityBadges/" import {i18nContext} from 'contexts/i18n'; export default class Infos extends Component { static contextType = i18nContext; render(){ const i18n = this.context; const { prod, openModalHandler, modalInDesktop } = this.props const immagine = const modalInDesktopStyle = (!modalInDesktop ? ' d-lg-none ' : '') const cardStyle = " card w-100 mw-100 bkg--dark p-3 " const isSticked = (false) ? " sticky-top sticky-top--sticked " : '' // per ora proviamo a NON METTERLO MAI sticked. return (
{/* titolo mobile */}

{prod.name}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.claim)}
{immagine}
{/* titolo tablet e desktop */}

{prod.name}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.claim)}
{ReactHtmlParser(prod.description)}
{ReactHtmlParser(prod.description)}
) } } Infos.contextType = i18nContext
